title: $38+ O/W Virgin America Sale Flights Through Winter
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $38+ O/W Virgin America Sale Flights Through Winter $38+ O/W Virgin America Sale Flights Through Winter August 4, 2015 2:37pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
It's Virgin America's birthday but it is they who come bearing gifts. With cheap flights starting at $38 one-way ($76 round-trip), the limited-time sale features travel to dozens of U.S. destinations, including Austin, Honolulu, Los Angeles, Orlando, and New York City. Tickets must be booked by 11:59 p.m. CT on August 6, and they're valid on Tuesday, Wednesday, and Saturday flights between August 22 - February 10.

It's Virgin America's birthday but it is they who come bearing gifts. With cheap flights starting at $38 one-way ($76 round-trip), the limited-time sale features travel to dozens of U.S. destinations, including Austin, Honolulu, Los Angeles, Orlando, and New York City. Tickets must be booked by 11:59 p.m. CT on August 6, and they're valid on Tuesday, Wednesday, and Saturday flights between August 22 - February 10. 
Blackout dates prohibit travel on September 7; October 9, 12; November 6, 9, 20-30; December 18-31; and January 1-4, 15, 18. See the sale provider for route-specific travel restrictions. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
